Thanks for the UL.  Good quality.  Great work.  Much appreciated.

In my opinion, this is A:9 (could be louder) and V:8 (as slightly dark at times, although very sharp image.

Gotta say though, as far as this film goes, I think it's the most overrated movie of the past couple of years.  Poor acting for the most part and while a very original idea and superb cinematography, a pretty dull plot and bunch of characters.  All in all, poorly written.  Very disappointing considering the potential of the concept imo.

Thanks again to the ULer of course.
